class_notes: (ENROLLMENT ADDED BY CANDLER REGISTRAR) (ON CAMPUS AUGUST-TERM INTENSIVE AUGUST 14-18) (Required for all new MDiv Students who entered in Fall 2023; meets on campus during and is integrated with New Student Orientation)
course_description: Required for all first-year Master of Divinity students in the fall semester, this course seeks to ground the MDiv student experience by joining critical studies of theological education with reflection on the questions that motivate each of us-faculty and students-to take up this work. In the course of studying communities of theological education, we will learn how to create community together, and how to shape that community into one that supports shared vocational, spiritual, and intellectual growth. Part A of the course takes place as an intensive in person experience during the same week as and integrated with New Student Orientation.
